title: A Tribo
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Indian, Buffet, Fusion, Brazilian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. After the hapless fire that consumed their former "oca" the South African owners decided to build a buffet-style with an Indian-based menu, without losing original references to the autoctonous culture of Brazilian. Buffet dishes are labeled which help vegans and diners with food allergy.
